titleStmt.title: Dispatch from John G. Willis to William L. Marcy, November 27, 1854

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Dispatch from John G. Willis to William L. Marcy
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.p:
Sir,
Yours of the 20th inst. was duly received together with my Passport & Navy Register. I have also received two packages containing the Statutes at Large & an American flag but have not received the Circular of Octo 8th filled out nor the Army Register.
I have this day drawn on you at three days after date in favor of Adams & Co for Fifteen dollars being amount of Stationary for the Commercial Agency at St. Paul de Loanda.

closer.salute:
I am Sir, Very Respectfully
Your Obedient Servant
closer.signed:
John G. Willis
Com Agent U. S. A.

address.addrLine: Secretary of State of the United States
